column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Came here for an anniversary dinner and everything was on point. I procrastinated on making reservations
column2: so we got a table at 9pm. Dark ambience with a unique
column6: was recommended and it was delicious and did the job. The salad was a great start
column7: the filet was a great entree (cooked perfectly) and the anniversary dessert was a great ending. Service was fantastic throughout. Recommend for a nice dinner.
